title: So do you just get nubs in the day                 8am to 40 pm
body: Iv played 4 games from 8am to 10 am and all iv got is a {{champion:28}} sup that went bot 1 time for 3min I timed it a {{champion:157}} {{champion:238}} adc sup lane a ap {{champion:36}} top and a jg {{champion:34}} with {{summoner:11}} {{summoner:6}} wtf is dis wen I play from 4pm + I get good players that know how to play and not go {{champion:34}} jg with walk fast

replies.body:
I think OP is trying to communicate, not sure, still decrypting the post.

But yeh, on the OCE server during the day it is generally downtime when school and work is in, so you get longer queues and therefore more of a difference in MMR making the games go way out of whack
There's not that many players online at that time, so they probably got a little slack on the MMR difference. I got 2 Diamonds against me in a morning game once. Still won :D
in my game at 9:30 I got bronze players and they had a plat and 2 silvers
